basics.name: Ying Huang
basics.label: Ph.D.
basics.summary: Photonics whizz turning light into computational power.

work.name: China Electronics Technology Group Corporation
work.summary: Developed silicon-based PIN electro-optic switches and device combination systems, realizing Sigmoid and ReLU activation functions. Achieved over 95% recognition accuracy on MNIST data through application of photonic neural networks.
highlights: Single-Layer Optical Network Chips and Nonlinear Module Technology

work.name: Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd
work.summary: Led system research on silicon-based MZI arrays and designed silicon-based electro-optic switch units. Achieved successful routing switch of a 56G OOK high-frequency signal.
highlights: Fast Wavelength Switching Optical Transceiver Technology.
